Who am I?
  • Junior, freshly admitted to the Informatics Department
  • New to TAing
  • Fact about me: I love robotics. Led 6 years of VEX Robotics through Middle to High School and 2 years of FRC in High School
  • Extensive experience with JavaScript and frameworks and stuff. This presentation is made (lazily) in JavaScript!
  • Working in the Code and Cognition Lab led by Dr. Andy Ko, doing lots of client side development and research
  • iGEM Lead Hardware/Software Engineer and Web Dev guy
  • I play video games in my free time

Getting set up
  • Visual Studio Code
    • Has a bunch of useful native features as well as variety of add ons
  • Terminal on Mac or Git Bash for windows
    • Windows may need Git Credential manager
  • NodeJS (comes with NPM)
  • npm i -g jest
    (i is for 'install', g is for 'global')
  • Find a more detailed list here in chapter 1 of the text

NodeJS

NPM (and Yarn)

Live-server

gh-pages

  • git checkout -b gh-pages
  • git add _____
  • git commit -m "_____"
  • git push --set-upstream origin gh-pages
